sentences.sContent: Did you meet any interesting people?
sentences.sCn: 你见过什么有意思的人吗？

sentences.sContent: It’s interesting that no one remembers seeing the car.
sentences.sCn: 竟然没人记得见过这辆车，真是有趣。

sentences.sContent: ...One of the reasons I find this topic very interesting is because my mom was a smoker when I was younger...
...it was interesting to see such a strange sight...
...many complain that their school libraries do not have enough up-to-date interesting books and magazines...
...and there's no interesting old city to make up for it...
...The most interesting place which I would like to take my foreign friends to is the Central Avenue...
...an interesting dialogue happens between the parents and their child on the Internet...
...I believe there is an interesting museum there...
...there are a few other interesting finding...
...include things such as having a challenging and interesting job...

words.tran: 感兴趣的；有权益的；有成见的
兴趣，爱好；利息；趣味；同行
使……感兴趣；引起……的关心；使……参与

trans.tranOther: if something is interesting, you give it your attention because it seems unusual or exciting or provides information that you did not know about
